title: Roulette:  Love Is A Losing Game
description: Sex, love, and Las Vegas, Roulette will take you on a thrilling adventure you won’t be able to put down. I’m Samantha Drake, and you might call me a Domme, but really I’m just a very successful woman in my 30s looking for sexy role-play without the complications of a relationship. Is it possible to for me to let him in, or is love a losing game? The first book of The Thomas Hunt Series, Roulette is a modern, steamy erotic novel set in Las Vegas. It contains explicit sexual scenes, light BDSM, and frequent profanity. It is intended for adults only.
